sentences.sContent: And provide the theory instruction for designing other types anemometer .
sentences.sContent_eng: And provide the theory instruction for designing other types anemometer .
sentences.sCn: 为今后设计其它类型的风速计提供理论指导。

sentences.sContent: Through analysis of hot-film probe temperature characteristic, platinum resistance is used as hot-film anemometer temperature compensation sensor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Through analysis of hot-film probe temperature characteristic, platinum resistance is used as hot-film anemometer temperature compensation sensor.
sentences.sCn: 通过对热膜探头的温度特性分析，提出采用铂电阻作为热膜风速计的温度补偿元件。

sentences.sContent: YFT type smart pressure anemometer is a multi-functional instrument basically for micro differential pressure measurement, with the additional function of temperature and static pressure measurement.
sentences.sContent_eng: YFT type smart pressure anemometer is a multi-functional instrument basically for micro differential pressure measurement, with the additional function of temperature and static pressure measurement.
sentences.sCn: YFT型智能压力风速计是以测量微差压为基本功能，同时具有测量温度和静压功能的多功能仪表。

phrases.pCn: 热线式风速计；热丝式风速计

remMethod.val: anemo (风) + meter (测量) → 风速计

words.tran: 测定风速风向的；测定风力的

trans.tranOther: an instrument for recording the speed and often the direction of winds
